response.overview: In the late 1960s, the Beach Boys' Brian Wilson stops touring, produces "Pet Sounds" and begins to lose his grip on reality. By the 1980s, under the sway of a controlling therapist, he finds a savior in Melinda Ledbetter.
response.tagline: The Life, Love and Genius of Brian Wilson
response.title: Love & Mercy

titles.title: Love & Mercy, la véritable histoire de Brian Wilson des Beach Boys

release_dates.note: Buenos Aires International Festival of Independent Cinema
